mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_SPECPRDSGMT set SPECLINE = #{SpecLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPECEFCTDATE = #{SpecEfctDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPECENDDATE = #{SpecEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USEDINSTAMT = #{UsedInstAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTFLAG = #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAGRAPHDEL = #{ParagraphDel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SPECPRDSGMTSEQNO = #{SpecPrdSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SPECPRDSGMTSEQNO, SPECLINE, SPECEFCTDATE, SPECENDDATE, USEDINSTAMT, REPORTFLAG,PARAGRAPHDEL from PBCRS_REPORT_SPECPRDSGMT where SPECPRDSGMTSEQNO = #{SpecPrdSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SPECPRDSGMTSEQNO, SPECLINE, SPECEFCTDATE, SPECENDDATE, USEDINSTAMT, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_SPECPRDSGMT
mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_SPECPRDSGMTM (SPECPRDSGMTSEQNO, SPECLINE, SPECEFCTDATE, SPECENDDATE, USEDINSTAMT, REPORTFLAG, ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS ) select SPECPRDSGMTSEQNO, SPECLINE, SPECEFCTDATE, SPECENDDATE, USEDINSTAMT, '0', ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS from PBCRS_REPORT_SPECPRDSGMT where SPECPRDSGMTSEQNO = #{SpecPrdSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
